repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.unittitle: ILR School Extension Division (Buffalo, N.Y.) Photographs

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations (NYSSILR)

did.abstract: This is a collection of photographs from Buffalo Labour Studies, BLS Graduates, Career Development, Supervisory Studies, some action shots and miscellaneous ILR images as well as some from the jazz event for the 50th Anniversary reception.

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183 kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This is a collection of photographs from Buffalo Labour Studies, BLS Graduates, Career Development, Supervisory Studies, some action shots and miscellaneous ILR images as well as some from the jazz event for the 50th Anniversary reception.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: ILR School Extension Division (Buffalo, N.Y.) Photographs #/4283 P. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
